meanings.definition: Proteases: enzymes that break down proteins by hydrolyzing peptide bonds.
meanings.sent1: Proteases help break down proteins in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study proteases to understand how they work.
meanings.sent3: The proteases at the party were busy breaking down the snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like proteases, slowly breaking down barriers.
meanings.sent5: The proteases acted like tiny scissors, cutting the protein chains apart.

meanings.definition: Proteases: proteins that catalyze the hydrolysis of peptide bonds in proteins.
meanings.sent1: Our bodies produce proteases to help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need proteases to repair their muscles after exercise.
meanings.sent3: The proteases in the kitchen were cooking up a storm.
meanings.sent4: His words were like proteases, breaking down her defenses.
meanings.sent5: The proteases worked tirelessly to break down the tough protein bonds.
